summary.title: Prospecting pipeline

workflow.empty_description: Create or move prospects to populate this stage.

actions.create_at_stage: Add a prospect in this stage

help.title: How to use the pipeline?
items: Drag and drop a prospect to the right stage to reflect its progress.
Each column groups prospects that share the same status for instant visibility.
You can add, edit, or delete a prospect directly from the dedicated actions.

lead.title: Lead
lead.description: New contact to qualify before proposing a meeting.

contact.title: Contacted
contact.description: Initial exchange completed to validate interest and needs.

meeting.title: Meeting scheduled
meeting.description: A meeting is booked; prepare the session and materials.

proposal.title: Proposal
proposal.description: A commercial proposal has been sent; collect feedback.

negotiation.title: Negotiation
negotiation.description: Refine the offer based on the prospect's responses before final validation.

won.title: Won
won.description: The prospect accepted; prepare the contract and onboarding steps.

lost.title: Lost
lost.description: The prospect will not move forward; archive and log the reasons.

todo.title: Athlete creation
todo.description: Fitdesk turns your won prospect into one of your athletes.

client.title: Client
client.description: Converted into an active client; ensure a smooth onboarding with the team.
